comment_body: Wholesome as, well, baseball and apple pie!
I half expected him to get squashed (ala Bambie vs Godzilla)

Thanks for reading.

[Index](https://www.reddit.com/r/normancrane/comments/j23dbt/table_of_contents/) of stories at [r/normancrane](https://www.reddit.com/r/normancrane)!
This is a great story, and you're a great writer, but I wouldn't say that this is scary.
